titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the Congress.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/13/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 14 until July 26, 1988, and of the Senate from July 14 or 15 until July 25, 1988.
